snippet: The European Union’s statistics agency said factory output fell in May, including in Germany, fueling worry that the mild recovery is already losing steam.
abstract: Eurostat says factory output fell 1.1 percent in 18 countries of eurozone bloc, as well as in the 28 countries of the European Union.
lead_paragraph: The European Union’s statistics agency said factory output fell in May, including in Germany, fueling worry that the mild recovery is already losing steam.

headline.main: Factory Output Plummets in Europe, Dogging Recovery
headline.print_headline: Factory Output Plummets in Europe, Dogging Recovery
